title: [Control systems] ABB security advisory (AV25-648)
description: On October 7, 2025, ABB published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: EIBPORT V3 KNX  versions prior to 3.9.2
EIBPORT V3 KNX GSM  versions prior to 3.9.2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
